name: Affordable Rentals
description: ASIAN, Inc. has been involved in the development and restoration of over 800 affordable housing units in various neighborhoods of San Francisco, including Chinatown, North Beach, SOMA, Visitacion Valley, and Bayview Hunters Point. Since 1978 Currently ASIAN, Inc. owns and manages a portfolio of 11 buildings ensuring secure and well-kept housing for low-income households in San Francisco.
